solution_line_template: He releases 1 video that is {short_video_length}*{long_video_multiplier}={long_video_length} minutes long

So each day he releases {short_video_length}+{short_video_length}+{long_video_length}=<<{short_video_length}+{short_video_length}+{long_video_length}={daily_minutes}>>{daily_minutes} minutes of videos
That means he releases {daily_minutes}*{days_per_week}=<<{daily_minutes}*{days_per_week}={weekly_minutes}>>{weekly_minutes} minutes of videos
